actions.name: CreateApp
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: CreateAppDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to deploy an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: CreateAppVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to create a version of an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: CreateApplicationInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Panorama Application Instance

actions.name: CreateDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Panorama datasource

actions.name: CreateDeploymentConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to configure a deployment for an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: CreateInputs
actions.description: Grants permission to generate a list of cameras on the same network as an AWS Panorama Appliance

actions.name: CreateJobForDevices
actions.description: Grants permission to create a job for an AWS Panorama Appliance

actions.name: CreateModel
actions.description: Grants permission to import a machine learning model into AWS Panorama

actions.name: CreateNodeFromTemplateJob
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Panorama Node

actions.name: CreatePackage
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Panorama Package

actions.name: CreatePackageImportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Panorama Package

actions.name: CreateStreams
actions.description: Grants permission to generate a list of streams available to an AWS Panorama Appliance

actions.name: DeleteApp
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: DeleteAppVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a version of an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: DeleteDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Panorama datasource

actions.name: DeleteDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister an AWS Panorama Appliance

actions.name: DeleteModel
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a machine learning model from AWS Panorama

actions.name: DeletePackage
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Panorama Package

actions.name: DeregisterPackageVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister an AWS Panorama Package Version

actions.name: DescribeApp
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: DescribeAppDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a deployment for an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: DescribeAppVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a version of an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: DescribeApplicationInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Panorama Application Instance

actions.name: DescribeApplicationInstanceDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Panorama Application Instance

actions.name: DescribeDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a datasource in AWS Panorama

actions.name: DescribeDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Panorama Appliance

actions.name: DescribeDeviceJob
actions.description: Grants permission to view job details for an AWS Panorama Appliance

actions.name: DescribeModel
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a machine learning model in AWS Panorama

actions.name: DescribeNode
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Panorama Node

actions.name: DescribeNodeFromTemplateJob
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about AWS Panorama Node

actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Panorama Package

actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Panorama Package

actions.name: DescribePackageVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about an AWS Panorama Package Version

actions.name: DescribeSoftware
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a software version for the AWS Panorama Appliance

actions.name: GetDeploymentConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to view details about a deployment configuration for an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: GetInputs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of cameras generated with CreateInputs

actions.name: GetStreams
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of streams generated with CreateStreams

actions.name: GetWebSocketURL
actions.description: Grants permission to generate a WebSocket endpoint for communication with AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListAppDeploymentOperations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of deployments for an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: ListAppVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of application versions in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListApplicationInstanceDependencies
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of application instance dependencies in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListApplicationInstanceNodeInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of node instances of application instances in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListApplicationInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of application instances in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListApps
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of applications in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListDataSources
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of datasources in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListDeploymentConfigurations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of deployment configurations in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListDevices
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of appliances in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListDevicesJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of jobs for an AWS Panorama Appliance

actions.name: ListModels
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of models in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListNodeFromTemplateJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of Nodes for an AWS Panorama Appliance

actions.name: ListNodes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of nodes in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListPackageImportJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of packages in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListPackages
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of packages in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of tags for a resource in AWS Panorama

actions.name: ProvisionDevice
actions.description: Grants permission to register an AWS Panorama Appliance

actions.name: RegisterPackageVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to register an AWS Panorama Package Version

actions.name: RemoveApplicationInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to remove an AWS Panorama Application Instance

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource in AWS Panorama

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource in AWS Panorama

actions.name: UpdateApp
actions.description: Grants permission to modify an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: UpdateAppConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the version-specific configuration of an AWS Panorama application

actions.name: UpdateDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to modify an AWS Panorama datasource

actions.name: UpdateDeviceMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to modify basic settings for an AWS Panorama Appliance
